eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing

Class MapQuestRoadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing.RoadManager
      • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing.MapQuestRoadManager

  • public class MapQuestRoadManager
extends RoadManager
    class to get a route between a start and a destination point, going through a list of waypoints. It uses MapQuest open, public and free API, based on OpenStreetMap data.
    See http://open.mapquestapi.com/guidance
    Author:
    M.Kergall

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BYCICLE
      bicycle - Bike route; Avoids limited access roads; Avoids roads where bicycle access is false; Favors bike specific paths and lower maxspeed roads.
      static java.lang.String FASTEST
      fastest - Quickest drive time route.
      static java.lang.String MULTIMODAL
      multimodal - Combination of walking and (if available) Public Transit.
      static java.lang.String PEDESTRIAN
      pedestrian - Walking route; Avoids limited access roads; Ignores turn restrictions.
      static java.lang.String SHORTEST
      shortest - Shortest driving distance route.
